cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on May 4, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2704, Improving VA Accountability to Prevent Sexual Harassment and Discrimination Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 68 (Tuesday, April 20, 2021)]
[House]
[Pages H1999-H2000]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. PAPPAS:
H.R. 2704.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
[[Page H2000]]
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 18 of the United States
Constitution

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
